name: links_finder
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool explorarc_s_link_finder.
Tool description: ExplorArc's Link Finder API simplifies the process of finding relevant links by returning results based on a given query. With this powerful tool, users can easily access the information they need to streamline their workflow and achieve their goals
API description: ExplorArc's Link Finder API simplifies the process of finding relevant links by returning results based on a given query. With this powerful tool, users can easily access the information they need to streamline their workflow and achieve their goals

query.description: The search query to find relevant links. Defaults to 'roadmap'.
